Verses: 2 naan Karththarai Nokki: Neer En Adaikkalam, En Kottai, En Dhevan, Naan Nambiyirukkiravar Endru Solluven.
3 avar Unnai Vedanudaiya Kannikkum, Paazhaakkum Kollainoikkum Thappuvippaar.
4 avar Thamadhu Siragugalaale Unnai Mooduvaar; Avar Settaigalin Keezhe Adaikkalam Puguvaai; Avarudaiya Saththiyam Unakkup Parisaiyum Ketagamumaagum.
5 iravil Undaagum Bayangaraththukkum, Pagalil Parakkum Ambukkum,
6 irulil Nadamaadum Kollainoikkum, Maththiyaanaththil Paazhaakkum Sangaaraththukkum Bayappadaadhiruppaai.
7 un Pakkaththil Aayiramperum, Un Valadhupuraththil Padhinaayiramperum Vizhundhaalum, Adhu Unnai Anugaadhu.
8 un Kangalaal Maaththiram Nee Adhaip Paarththu, Dhunmaarkkarukku Varum Balanaik Kaanbaai.
9 enakku Adaikkalamaayirukkira Unnadhamaana Karththarai Unakkuth Thaabaramaagakkondaai.
10 aagaiyaal Pollaappu Unakku Neridaadhu, Vaadhai Un Koodaaraththai Anugaadhu.
11 un Vazhigalilellaam Unnaik Kaakkumpadi, Unakkaakath Thammudaiya Thoodhargalukkuk Kattalaiyiduvaar.
12 un Paadham Kallil Idaraadhapadikku Avargal Unnaith Thangal Kaigalil Endhikkondupovaargal.
13 singaththinmelum Viriyan Paambinmelum Nee Nadandhu, Paalasingaththaiyum Valusarppaththaiyum Midhiththuppoduvaai.
14 avan Ennidaththil Vaanjaiyaayirukkirapadiyaal Avanai Viduvippen; En Naamaththai Avan Arindhirukkirapadiyaal Avanai Uyarndha Adaikkalaththile Vaippen.
15 avan Ennai Nokkik Kooppiduvaan, Naan Avanukku Maruuththaravu Arulichcheyven; Aabaththil Naane Avanodirundhu, Avanaith Thappuviththu, Avanaik Ganappaduththuven.
16 neediththa Naatkalaal Avanaith Thirupthiyaakki, En Ratchippai Avanukkuk Kaanbippen.
